mapInfos.title: Map Infos
mapInfos.description: An object that describes each map available in the application. The property name is the id for the map and should not change since it's used as a URL parameter.

name.description: The name of the map that shows up in the tab control

category.description: The category that this map should be under in the configure maps dialog box. This is optional and translatable

webMapId.description: The id of the web map that you would like displayed

hideLayerSelector.description: Determines whether the layer selector widget is displayed or not

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Contains configs for the Filter widget.

name.title: Tab-specific Filter Name
name.description: Optionally configures the title of the filter panel. If this property is not set, "trans:filter" will be used.

toggle.description: Configures the toggle buttons at the top of the filter in the transportation tab.

label.description: The label for the toggle buttons

mode.description: The label for the mode button

phase.description: The label for the phase button

modeLayers.description: The layer name keys that correspond to the mode button

phaseLayers.description: The layer name keys that correspond to the phase button

layerNames.description: Defines all of the layer names as they show up in the web map. The key is a unique id (whatever you want) for the layer. This key is used elsewhere in the filter config. The value is the name of the layer as defined in the web map.

phases.description: Defines the values associated with each phase for each layer. The property name should match a properties name from layerName and the value should be an array of strings with the first value being the field name and the next up to four values defining phases 1, 2, 3 & unfunded (in that order).

modes.description: Defines the values associated with each mode for each layer. The property name should match a properties name from layerName and the value should be an array of strings with the first value being the field name and the next up to three values defining modes 'roads', 'transit', and 'bikePed' (in that order).

checkboxes.description: Defines checkboxes for toggling visibility of one to many layers.

layerNames.description: Defines the layer(s) that you want to toggle. Values must match the property names of `layerNames` above.

offByDefault.description: Set this to true to make the checkbox unchecked on load.

phase.description: Defines the zero-based index of the phase that this checkbox is associated with.

mode.description: Defines the zero-based index of the mode that this checkbox is associated with.

symbol.description: Defines the type of symbol component to be displayed.

symbolImageFile.description: Defines the filename for the image that should be used for the symbol. Note that the file needs to be placed in the root of the application. Note that this is only applicable when `symbol = 'image'`.

symbolLayerNames.description: Used to restrict the layers for which symbols are shown. If this is not passed, then all layers are shown. To overlap layer symbols, include them in the same sub-array. (e.g. [["LayerOne", "LayerToOverlap"], ["LayerTwo"]]) Note that this is only applicable when `symbol = 'simple'`. To display a specific symbol for a layer that uses a unique value renderer, specify the index of the symbol using a "-". (e.g. LayerName-2)

symbolLabels.description: Optionally define text that will show in a popover when hovering over the associated symbol. Note that the order of this property should match the order of `symbolLayerNames`.

staticColors.description: Used to define colors for the `staticColors` symbol type.

color.description: Used for the phase checkboxes. Defines the color as an rgb value. HSA may also work.

phases.description: Defines the field name and values that correspond to each of the phases (1, 2, 3 & unfunded) for the appropriate layers.

items.description: The first value is the field name and subsequent values correspond to the phases. The unfunded phase value is optional.

checkboxes.description: Checkboxes to be included in the group. Values must match the property names for `checkboxes` above.

radio.description: Controls whether the children are checkboxes or radio buttons.

showFilterByPhasing.description: Controls whether the "(filter by phasing)" checkbox is displayed

queryFilter.title: QueryFilter
queryFilter.description: Contains configs for the Query Filter widget.

layerName.description: Defines the layer name that this widget is wired up to as it is defined in the web map

fields.description: Contains a list of field objects that are associated with this widget.

items.title: Query Filter Field
items.description: Defines a field and associated data

label.description: The heading label for the field. Shows up in the app as a bold heading above the checkboxes.

openOnLoad.description: Controls whether or not the field section is open or closed by default

fieldName.description: The name of the field as it is defined in the layer.

fieldType.description: Defines the field as either text or number. This is required for making valid SQL queries.

checkboxes.description: The list of checkboxes and associated values.

color.description: The rgb color of the legend swatch (e.g. rbg(255, 128, 0).

other.description: Mark this as true to make this checkbox represent all other values that are not defined by the other checkboxes

name.title: Tab-specific Project Information Name
name.description: Optionally configures the project information widget for this tab. If this property is not set, "trans:projectInformation" will be used.

sherlock.description: Configuration options for the map search widget

serviceUrl.description: The URL to the service that you would like to search features on.

searchField.description: The name of the field that you would like the search to be applied to.

placeHolder.description: The place holder text that shows up in the text box before a user starts typing.

layerSelector.description: Configuration options for the base map selector widget

Factory.description: The name of the esrijs module associated with the layer type

urlTemplate.description: The urlTemplate for the layer. "{quadWord}" will be automatically replaced with the appropriate value at runtime.

Factory.description: The name of the esrijs module associated with the layer type

landingPage.description: This is the URL for the links on the logo (larger screens) and "Wasatch Choice" tab link (smaller screens)

tagLine.description: This is the URL for the tag line link. If there the value is an empty string, then the link becomes just a span that is not clickable.

openOnLoad.description: Controls whether specific map widgets default to be open on page load

translations.description: Contains the translated strings used in the app. Falls back to `en` if there is no other translation. Most strings in the other configs can be translated by using this format: `trans:<key>`. For example: `trans:visionMapTitle`.
translations.title: Translations

maxTabsAllowed.title: Max Tabs Allowed
maxTabsAllowed.description: Restricts the number of tabs that a user is allowed to add.

excludedLayers.description: Layer titles that will be excluded from the click results
